languages.text: Inflicts Slowed on failed AGI test until the end of combat. Always Crits against Slowed targets.

traits.locale_text: Inflicts Slowed on failed AGI test until the end of combat. Always Crits against Slowed targets.

languages.text: The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} until the end of combat. Attacks with this weapon always score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against slowed targets.

Attacks with this weapon always score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against slowed targets.

The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} until the end of combat. Attacks with this weapon always score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against slowed targets.

languages.text:
対象は {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功する必要があり、失敗した場合は戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}状態になる。
この武器での攻撃は、スロウ状態の対象に対して常に{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}となる。
languages.original_text: The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} until the end of combat. Attacks with this weapon always score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against slowed targets.

traits.locale_text:
対象は {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功する必要があり、失敗した場合は戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}状態になる。
この武器での攻撃は、スロウ状態の対象に対して常に{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}となる。

languages.text: Цель выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получает эффект {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедления{/g} до конца боя. Попадания из этого оружия по замедленным целям всегда являются {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическими{/g}.

Attacks with this weapon always score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against slowed targets.

languages.text: Misslingt seine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, wird das Ziel bis zum Ende des Kampfes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}. Angriffe mit dieser Waffe fügen verlangsamten Zielen immer einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} zu.

Attacks with this weapon always score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against slowed targets.

traits.locale_text: Misslingt seine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}, wird das Ziel bis zum Ende des Kampfes {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}. Angriffe mit dieser Waffe fügen verlangsamten Zielen immer einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} zu.

languages.text: Hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlar{/g}. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Bu silahla yapılan saldırılar, yavaşlayan hedeflere {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} indirir.
languages.original_text: The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} until the end of combat. Attacks with this weapon always score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against slowed targets.

traits.locale_text: Hedef, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlar{/g}. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Bu silahla yapılan saldırılar, yavaşlayan hedeflere {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} indirir.

languages.text: La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Les attaques de cette arme infligent systématiquement des {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coups critiques{/g} aux cibles subissant Ralentissement.
languages.original_text: The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} until the end of combat. Attacks with this weapon always score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against slowed targets.

traits.locale_text: La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Les attaques de cette arme infligent systématiquement des {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coups critiques{/g} aux cibles subissant Ralentissement.

languages.text: El objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} hasta el final del combate. Los ataques efectuados con esta arma siempre asestan un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} a objetivos ralentizados.
languages.original_text: The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} until the end of combat. Attacks with this weapon always score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against slowed targets.

traits.locale_text: El objetivo debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} hasta el final del combate. Los ataques efectuados con esta arma siempre asestan un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} a objetivos ralentizados.

languages.text: 受到攻击的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，效果持续至战斗结束。这把武器攻击减速状态的敌人时，必定会造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}。
languages.original_text: The target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} until the end of combat. Attacks with this weapon always score a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} against slowed targets.

traits.locale_text: 受到攻击的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}状态，效果持续至战斗结束。这把武器攻击减速状态的敌人时，必定会造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}。
